meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Martha Guaglianone David M. Scott Jack Lechner Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #979.

td.p: Martha Guaglianone, a broadcast operations manager originally from Johnsonburg, Pennsylvania
David M. Scott, a temporary office worker originally from Shawnee, Oklahoma
Jack Lechner, a freelance writer originally from Arlington, Virginia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,000)

tr.td: THE '80S
SINGERS
SHAKESPEAREAN TRIVIA
RELIGIOUS HISTORY
"THE JOY OF COOKING"
(Alex: That's the book.)
DID YOU NOTICE?
